prior_root_cause: (1) ATLAS_ROOT misconfigured or empty; (2) pdf_sources_extract exits 42 when input pack missing and PDF_EXTRACT_ALLOW_FALLBACK not set
prior_recommended_fix: ATLAS_ROOT discovery + validation; PDF_EXTRACT_ALLOW_FALLBACK=1 in spawn env; classify exit 42 as ATLAS_PIPELINE_BLOCKED with evidence
